sub_title: Making the world run better and improve people’s lives
summary:
Since 2000 I am working as a sales professional in the software industry. Through roles in partner management, sales operations, key account management and strategic customer programs, I have gained experiences in various elements of the IT software business. During my years as Global Account Director I have focussed on building strategic partnerships with companies like Unilever, Philips, FrieslandCampina, Heineken and ASML. In 2018 and 2019 I was part of the Platinum Customer Unit (PCU) at SAP as the Sales & Strategy lead. The PCU has a clear focus on building mutually beneficial partnerships with our (20) most strategic (global) customers. This to become a true business partner and trusted innovator for these leading global brands. Since January 2020 I have joined the SAP Netherlands Management Team as Sales Director Strategic Accounts. In this role I am responsible for managing a team of Sales Professionals that take care of customers like Shell, Unilever, Philips, Heineken and ASML.
 
Besides my business interests I am currently focused on my Master (MSc) program at Middlesex University in London. As part of this program I am exploring the value of purpose driven partnerships and how Millennials and GenZ look at companies as potential clients and/or employees. Furthermore I enjoy coaching my daughters hockey team and playing golf and hockey myself.

Specialties: Purpose driven, Shared values, Growth mindset, Digital, Marketing & Sales, Operations, Demand Generation, Board Sponsorship Program, Strategic Partnerships, Account Management, Coaching, Managing the eco-system, Cloud, Unilever, ASML, Philips, SAP, High Tech, Consumer Products, SAP Masters MsC.

education.field_of_study: Professional Practice in Leading Sales Transformation

profile_positions.description: As Chief Partner Officer at SAP, my team is responsible for managing, building, and extending our rich partner eco-system. These relationships with the global strategic service partners, value added resellers, strategic advisory firms, Hyperscalers etc, are instrumental to accelerate our Cloud business. This to achieving our overall ambition to make the world run better and improve people's lives.
profile_positions.title: Chief Partner Officer

profile_positions.description:
Being part of the Dutch SAP Management Team I am responsible for the sales
teams leading our Strategic Customers in the Netherlands like Shell, Unilever, Heineken, 
Philips, Signify and ASML. These accounts are led by Global Account Directors (GAD) who have
an end to end responsibility for these customers and lead their multi-disciplinary SAP
account teams. The GAD’s and the Industry Account Executives report to the
Sales Director Strategic Accounts.
profile_positions.title: Sales Director Strategic Accounts

profile_positions.description: In the role of Sales & Strategy Lead for the SAP Platinum Customer Unit (PCU) I supported the Global General Manager for this unit. The PCU program hosts our top 20 customers globally like Nestle, Apple, Shell, ExxonMobil, Samsung etc. I was responsible for defining the PCU strategy, Sales Operations, Board Sponsorship Program and demand generation.
profile_positions.title: Platinum Customer Unit - Sales & Strategy Lead

profile_positions.description: In my role as Global Account Director for Philips I focus on strengthening the strategic relationship between our both companies. This to ensure they utilize their SAP investments and in parallel we extend our partnership by introducing relevant Health Innovations supporting their digital transformation.
profile_positions.title: Global Account Director Philips

profile_positions.description: My responsibility is driving and building the strategic partnership between Unilever and SAP. As Global Account Director I am globally accountable for the overall relationship with a focus on supporting Unilever in utilizing their existing and future SAP investments next to driving business relevant (digital) innovation.
profile_positions.title: Global Account Director Unilever

profile_positions.description: During these years I was the Sales Executive for companies like ASML and FrieslandCampina. In addition, I was part of the Global Account Team for HEINEKEN. In this role I was responsible for utilizing SAP’s global resources across all lines of business and geographies to deliver maximum value to these companies.
profile_positions.title: Senior Account Executive

profile_positions.description: In 2007 a new overlay sales team was created with a focus on introducing strategic solutions into the SAP installed base. I was invited by our sales management to join this team and focus on the introduction of reseller (software) solutions like Adobe, OpenText, IDS Scheer and Redwood to our customers.
profile_positions.title: Overlay Sales Executive

profile_positions.description: As part of the SME sales team I focussed on the professional services- and transportation market in the Netherlands. My responsibility was to create new names at companies like law firms, employment agencies, transportation companies and accountancy firms. This involved both direct- and indirect (SAP Reseller Channel) engagements.
profile_positions.title: Sales Executive SME

profile_positions.description: As Sales Operations Manager I supported the Dutch Sales Director of SAP. My focus included the localisation of new SAP corporate strategies like the setup of a mid-market sales team. In addition, I had a focus on enabling lead management, value based selling workshops and sales training for our salesforce.
profile_positions.title: Sales Operations Manager

profile_positions.description: During these 3 years I was responsible for the alliances with key system integrators, technology suppliers and software partners. My responsibilities included joint lead generation, enabling incremental revenue and ensuring successful SAP implementations in the Dutch market.
profile_positions.title: Alliance Manager
